mod.name: The Dragon Tamer
mod.description:
Adds a character called The Dragon Tamer, who fights together with his faithful dragon.

- Adds 75 cards and 12 relics.


v1.1.2 (2021-01-09)
- Fix crash with Menagerie mod.


For older patch notes, see: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2301555870

cards.name: Double Hit
cards.description:
Dragon deals
8 damage twice.

cards.name: Double Hit+
cards.description:
Dragon deals
11 damage twice.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Switching Tactic
cards.description:
Reverse ragontaer:Aggro.
This turn, ALL enemies lose Strength equal to ragontaer:Aggro difference.

cards.name: Switching Tactic+
cards.description:
Retain.
Reverse ragontaer:Aggro.
This turn, ALL enemies lose Strength equal to ragontaer:Aggro difference.

5 Block.

cards.description:

8 Block.

cards.name: Hard Skin

cards.name: Hard Skin+

cards.name: Bizarre Tactic
cards.description:
You gain 10 Block.
Whenever Dragon is attacked this turn, deal 5 damage back.

cards.name: Bizarre Tactic+

Whenever Dragon is attacked this turn, deal 8 damage back.

cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Cleansing Strike+
cards.description:

cards.name: Combo Attack
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Dragon deals 5 damage.
Gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.

cards.name: Combo Attack+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Dragon deals 7 damage.
Gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.

cards.description: Deal 7 damage. If the enemy has Weak, deal 7 damage again.

15 damage.

cards.description: Weakened enemies deal 2 less damage to your team.

cards.name: Calculated Defense+
cards.description: Weakened enemies deal 3 less damage to your team.

cards.name: Conduct
cards.description: If the ragontaer:Aggro difference is 5 or higher, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Conduct+
cards.description: If the ragontaer:Aggro difference is 5 or higher, draw 3 cards.

cards.description:

Exhaust any Status or Curse cards revealed.

cards.description: Whenever your team ragontaer:Switch, gain [E].

cards.name: Cross Step+

cards.description: Dragon deals 4 damage twice and apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Dark Breath+

cards.description:

gain 6 Strength.

You gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Last Stand+

cards.name: Reckless Flurry+

cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.

cards.description:

Deal 10 damage.

cards.name: Shield Drain+

Deal 13 damage.

cards.description:
Retain.
The ragontaer:Rear gains
7 ragontaer:Aggro.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shift+

Retain.
Choose one:
You or Dragon gains
7 ragontaer:Aggro.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sneak Attack
cards.description:
Can only be played if You are the ragontaer:Rear.
Deal 4 damage 4 times.

cards.name: Sneak Attack+
cards.description:
Can only be played if You are the ragontaer:Rear.
Deal 5 damage 4 times.

cards.name: Star Rain
cards.description: Deal 5 damage X+1 times. This attack does not increase ragontaer:Aggro.

cards.name: Star Rain+

cards.description:
The ragontaer:Front gains
6 Block.

9 Block.

cards.description:

The attacker ragontaer:Taunts that enemy.

cards.name: Taunting Strike+
cards.description:

cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Warm-Up+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.description:

Exhaust.

cards.name: Echo Tactic+
cards.description:

Reduce its cost by 2.
Exhaust.

cards.description:

cards.name: Excess Footwork+
cards.description:

At the end of each turn, lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.description:
Dragon deals

9 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.description:

Exhaust.

cards.name: Gear Up+

Add 2 *Safety+ and *Hard *Skin+ into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Harmonize
cards.description: Whenever both You and Dragon attack in a single turn, gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.

cards.name: Harmonize+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever both You and Dragon attack in a single turn, gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.

cards.name: Head Start
cards.description:
Innate.
Choose one:
Gain [E] [E] , or
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Head Start+
cards.description:
Innate.
Choose one:
Gain [E] [E] [E] , or
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Inferno
cards.description:
Dragon deals
32 damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle a *Burn into your draw pile for each enemy.

cards.name: Inferno+
cards.description:
Dragon deals
40 damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle a *Burn into your draw pile for each enemy.

cards.name: Light Shield
cards.description:
You gain 14 Block.
Dragon gains 14 Block.
Costs 1 less [E] for each ragontaer:Bonding bonus you received this combat.

cards.name: Light Shield+
cards.description:
You gain 18 Block.
Dragon gains 18 Block.
Costs 1 less [E] for each ragontaer:Bonding bonus you received this combat.

cards.name: Multitask
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards whenever you do
2 of these:
Create a *Burn, apply Weak, or ragontaer:Switch.

cards.name: Multitask+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards whenever you do
2 of these:
Create a *Burn, apply Weak, or ragontaer:Switch.

cards.name: Opening Tactic
cards.description:
Innate.
If the enemy has full HP, Gain 1 Dexterity.
Deal 11 damage.

cards.name: Opening Tactic+
cards.description:
Innate.
If the enemy has full HP, Gain 1 Dexterity.
Deal 15 damage.

cards.name: Outburst
cards.description: Dragon enters Wrath for 2 turns.

cards.name: Outburst+
cards.description: Dragon enters Wrath for 2 turns.

cards.name: Prediction
cards.description:
Choose a card from your draw pile and put it on top.
It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Prediction+
cards.description:
Choose a card from your draw pile and put it on top.
It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Repeat Strike
cards.description: Dragon deals 12 damage. At the start of each turn, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Repeat Strike+
cards.description:
Innate.
Dragon deals 12 damage. At the start of each turn, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Resonance Form
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Effects that give only one of your team Strength, Dexterity or Block now affect both.

cards.name: Resonance Form+
cards.description: Effects that give only one of your team Strength, Dexterity or Block now affect both.

cards.name: Safeguard
cards.description: The ragontaer:Rear no longer loses Block at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Safeguard+
cards.description:
Innate.
The ragontaer:Rear no longer loses Block at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Sealed Strike
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Can be Upgraded 5 times. On 5th upgrade, Upgrade ALL cards in your deck.

cards.name: Sealed Strike+1
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Can be Upgraded 5 times. On 5th upgrade, Upgrade ALL cards in your deck.

cards.name: Shadow Image
cards.description: Whenever You or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains 2 Block.

cards.name: Shadow Image+
cards.description: Whenever You or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains 3 Block.

cards.name: Stun Trap
cards.description:
After 2 turns, Stun the enemy and draw 2 cards.
ragontaer:Channeling.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stun Trap+
cards.description:
After 2 turns, Stun the enemy and draw 4 cards.
ragontaer:Channeling.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tri Attack
cards.description:
Choose 3 times:
You deal 6 damage or Dragon deals 6 damage.

cards.name: Tri Attack+
cards.description:
Choose 3 times:
You deal 9 damage or Dragon deals 9 damage.

relics.name: Pact Stone
relics.description: At the start of each combat, You and Dragon gain 5 Temporary_HP each.

relics.name: Basic Textbook
relics.description: Increase the damage of Strike and Block from Target Defense by 2.
relics.flavorText: Basic skills are the most important things to learn.

relics.name: Ancient Bone
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Hard Skin into your hand.

relics.name: Dragon Food
relics.description: At the end of combat, Dragon heals 3 HP.

relics.name: Tactical Note
relics.description: All cards containing "Tactic" have their effects boosted.

relics.name: Binding String
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if You and Dragon have the same ragontaer:Aggro, gain 2 ragontaer:Bonding.
relics.flavorText: The combination of two fighters is better when they are close.

relics.name: Solid Memories
relics.description: At the start of turn 2, Fetch a card from your discard pile. It costs 0 for the turn.
relics.flavorText: The origin form of Liquid Memories.

relics.name: Magic Stone
relics.description:
Replaces Pact Stone. At the start of each combat, You and Dragon heal 7 HP.
During combat, excess amount of healing is converted to Temporary_HP.
relics.flavorText: The Pact Stone absorbed weird magic.

relics.name: The Chair
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. On turn 1, you only draw Innate cards and cards in Bottle relics.
relics.flavorText: This comfortable chair makes you energized, but switching from rest mode becomes harder. Unless you're talented.

relics.name: Mind Bender
relics.description: When you play a card that let you choose the attacker, you may pick any enemy as the attacker.

relics.name: Odd Armor
relics.description:
On odd-numbered turns, Dragon takes 2 less damage from attacks.
On even-numbered turns, You take 2 less damage from attacks.
relics.flavorText: Because it looks odd, people don't want to wear it even though it's powerful.

relics.name: Switch Button
relics.description: Once per combat, right click to activate. You and Dragon swaps ragontaer:Aggro.

keywords.name: Aggro
keywords.description: Whenever You or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains 1 Aggro. The character with higher Aggro becomes the Front, taking all attacks.

keywords.name: Blaze Potion
keywords.description: A potion which deals 40 damage to an enemy.

keywords.name: Bonding
keywords.description:
Whenever your team gains 5 Bonding, choose 1 of 3 random bonuses.
Only works while Dragon is alive.

keywords.name: Channeling
keywords.description: If You attack or an enemy attacks You before the effect kicks in, it is cancelled.

keywords.name: Front
keywords.description:
The character marked with Front Marker.
All enemies attack the Front.

keywords.name: Rear
keywords.description: The character not marked with Front Marker.

keywords.name: Switch
keywords.description:
The Front becomes the Rear, and vice versa.
Switch happens when the Aggro of the Rear becomes higher than the Front.

keywords.name: Taunt
keywords.description:
When an enemy is Taunted, it will always attack the Taunter, not the Front.
Taunt lasts for 1 turn.
